title: Get 3 chances to win $1 million with these QR code puzzles
content: There’s not much that can make puzzles more exciting, but the chance to win a million dollars once you complete one is up there. The One Million Dollar Puzzle by MSCHF (3-Pack) gives you 3 chances to assemble a 500 piece puzzle and potentially win big. This 3-pack of puzzles is on sale for $75.99 (Reg. $90).  […]
